title: The proposed development shall be further subject to such conditions as may be decided by the Authority
clause_text: The proposed development shall be further subject to such conditions as may be decided by the Authority.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.
